name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Today is the one-year anniversary of the start of Robert Mueller’s Russia investigation . President Trump celebrated the way he honors all his anniversaries — he forgot. The royal wedding is this Saturday . After the ceremony, Harry and Meghan will ride around in a carriage to wave at the public. While the guests will be back at the reception going, “When the hell are they going feed us?” A lot of celebrities are going to be at the royal wedding this weekend, like Serena Williams and the Spice Girls. But Yanni had to RSVP no. He said, “I think I got the invitation by mistake. This envelope was addressed to Laurel.” Levi’s just released a smart jacket that lets you know when your Uber arrives. It’s great for people who love to have all the latest gadgets — except a phone.
